alert.note: Alert for McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 09 at 9:36PM CST until March 09 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central McLennan County in central Texas... * Until 1015 PM CST. * At 935 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Waco, or near Woodway, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Waco, Hewitt, Robinson, Bellmead, Woodway, Lacy-Lakeview, McGregor, Beverly Hills, Riesel, Hallsburg, Lake Waco, Tradinghouse Creek Reservoir, Northcrest, Lake Creek Lake, Willow Grove, Axtell, Downsville and Elm Mott. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 328 and 342. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
